document.full_text: investors dumped nokia shares again on wednesday, taking them to their lowest in more than 13 years after a profit warning a day earlier raised fears the handset maker may never regain its shrinking market share.
document.title: nokia on the ropes as analysts slash targets
lines_and_colors: investors dumped nokia shares again on wednesday, taking them to their lowest in more than 13 years after a profit warning a day earlier raised fears the handset maker may never regain its shrinking market share.
